version_description: Grab a cup of hot cocoa, your warmest blanket, and curl up by the fire with this cozy winter update from PBS KIDS Games. Get the latest for all the winter surprises!
Happy New Year from PBS KIDS Games! This update contains a few minor design updates.
PBS KIDS Games celebrates Valentine’s Day! This update is packed with tons of lovely holiday surprises from all of your favorite PBS KIDS characters.
Minor design updates
PBS KIDS Celebrates Spring! Update Play PBS KIDS Games for some fun new surprises and be on the lookout for all new games springing up every week!

- PBS KIDS Celebrates Spring! Update Play PBS KIDS Games for some fun surprises and be on the lookout for all new games springing up every week!
- This update also includes a minor performance enhancement.
Minor design updates

Get ready for all new games from the Ruff Ruffman Show!
This update also includes game performance enhancements.
Play PBS KIDS Games is ready for Halloween! Get the latest version of the app for tons of surprises!

- Play PBS KIDS Games is ready for Halloween! Get the latest version of the app for tons of surprises!
- Update also include various bug fixes
Minor Design Updates

PBS KIDS Games celebrates Winter with this all-new update! Get the latest for tons of fun Winter surprises!

This update also includes:
- iPhone X Support
- Smaller overall file size
- Various bug fixes, including missing audio

PBS KIDS Games celebrates Winter with this all-new update! Get the latest for tons of fun Winter surprises!

This update also includes:
- iPhone X Support
- Smaller overall file size
- Active device ringer is no longer required for audio. Our apologies for the inconvenience.
